document_name: VOICE - Extension Letter from Secretary, MSWSS
VOICE - Extension Letter from UNDP CD

outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to facilitate the process which will lead to establishmnet of a statutory body for promotion of volunteerism with an implementable programme plan that will see the rich heritage of volunteering which exists in Sri Lanka, transformed into a dynamic tool for social development. The project will involve facilitating the legislative process that will lead to the establihmen of VOICE as a statutory body . It will also develop and cement a collaboration between GoSL and all sectors of civil society for the development of volunteerism as an important mechanism for poverty eradication, gender equality, youth development and peace building. 
In order to meet these long term goals the project aims to build the foundation for an enabling national infrastructure to support volunteering. This will contribute towards volunteerism fulfilling the immense potential that it holds for empowering individuals, and creating strong cohesive communities which is an important catalyst for development.

project_title: Support to Volunteerism in SL through Volunteer Center
